page.description: Generates a string using the specified ASCII value repeated multiple times.
page.prototype: Result_String as C = chr_multi(N ascii_value ,N count )

argument.name: ascii_value
argument.description: The ASCII value of a character. Numeric

argument.name: count
argument.description: The number of times to repeat the character. Numeric

return.name: Result_String
return.description: A string with Count repetitions of the character specified by ASCII_Value.

page.discussion: The CHR_MULTI() function produces a string with Count repetitions of the character specified by ASCII_Value.
